com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Am4Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Am4Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl

    public class Am4Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl
    Public API for the AM4

    The class provides methods to control AM4 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a AM4 device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new AM4 device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect AM4 device.
